updates.text: [TEL] UPDATE: Train services have resumed. We are sorry for affecting your commute.
[TEL] UPDATE: Train services are progressively recovering. Free regular bus and bridging bus services are available.
[TEL] UPDATE: Trains are moving slower between Woodlands North and Caldecott.Â  Free regular bus and bridging bus services are available.
[TEL]: Due to a track signal fault, trains are moving slower between Woodlands North and Caldecott in both directions.
